version_description:
Now supports the Apple Watch : 
- receive a notification when your baby is awake
- live streaming of your baby base
Fully functional with 3G/4G
Crash fix on iOS 8.3 and improved stability

-Join our Baby Club : enjoy the gifts and improve the libraries of your apps.
-Minor bug fixes.

-Join our Baby Club : enjoy the gifts and improve the libraries of your apps.
-Bug fixes iOS9.

NEW FEATURES
*Baby Monitor gets a new design. Check out the new graphics and enjoy a new user experience !
*Intuitive tutorial: watch the new tutorial and setup Baby Monitor in less than 5 minutes.
*Switch camera: you can now switch between the front and back camera and choose the viewing angle of your baby
*Flashlight: see in the dark, use the flashlight option
*New animation for the Nightlight option
*Ease of use for visually impaired person

CORRECTIONS
*Multiple bug fix

- 2 new night lights to discover! 
- minor bug fix

New version of Baby Monitor with amazing features:
- It's very easy to set up in less than 5 minutes
- Performance improvements: it's easier to check on your sleeping baby

- It's very easy to set up in less than 5 minutes
- Performance improvements: it's easier to check on your sleeping baby
